thread.section_title: Topcashback Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Topcashback | topcashback.com
thread.title: Ian

author: Ian
title: Ian
text: First time using the site and I have to say it's very poor. Dates keep changing and it sounds like I am just being fobbed off. Terrible site and I won't be recommending it to anyone. I have asked when my cash back will be available but every time another week gets added on. I only switched due to the offer on the site as it worked out cheaper but so far has cost me more money than my previous provider. I will make sure to let as many people know as I can that it is not worth using this site!!! Very poor customer service and more and more this just feels like a scam site!!! I have been waiting since Dec 13th but no resolution or payable date I just get sent marketing emails asking saying" Hey, we've got your (cash) back" yeah I bet they have but their not giving it to me. Total scam!!!!
